import React from 'react' import { Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import AddArticle from './AddArticle' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' function AuthorProfile() { let {currentUser}=useSelector(state=>state.userAuthorReducer) return (

) } export default AuthorProfile
